name: Beetplanet
description:
Beetplanet is a real-time strategy game with RPG elements.

A small expeditionary group settled on a distant desert planet and discovered
a huge army of invaders who decided to appropriate all natural resources for themselves. Your squad decides
help the local population of the planet and protect them.
Equip your base, place power generators and turrets, upgrade your cannons, slashing your enemies!

In the game, you have to develop your base by placing and improving automatic turrets, which
will shoot at nearby enemies. The goal of the game is to build the biggest base and
fight off all the waves.

Hold LMB to move the camera. Mouse wheel - zoom in or out.
Click LMB on an empty cell to build a turret.
Press LMB on the cage with the turret to upgrade it.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Pumping your equipment.
- Enemies adaptive to progress.
